2025-12-17:
Weekly Highlights

Advanced Routing

Introduced new capabilities based on transaction initiators and issuer countries.

Expanded Connectors

Added specialized flows for Peach Pre-Auth, Braintree 3DS, and WorldpayWPG payouts.

UCS Tunnel

New support for sessions, PayPal Post-Auth, and granular authentication.

Identity & Security

Launched OIDC infrastructure, discovery endpoints, and Generic Locker API.

Standardized Errors

Implemented GSM schema updates for consistent error codes across platform.

Connectors

Peach & Braintree
Peach: Added support for Pre-Auth flows with full reversal capabilities#10590
Braintree: Introduced support for external 3DS pass-through authentication#10591
Worldpay & Zift
WorldpayWPG: Implemented Fast Access feature for payout processing#10647
Zift: Removed redundant billing fields and added account verification#10665
Stripe & NMI
Stripe: Expanded zero-amount mandate & refined Affirm/Klarna configs#10644
NMI: Fixed issue where merchant_defined_fields were double encoded#10603
J.P. Morgan: Refactored capture and void requests for proper mapping#10617

Core & Platform

Launched OIDC infrastructure including discovery endpoints#10145
Enhanced user role validation and inviter-invitee checks#10608
Locker API: Generic handler to unify sensitive data management#10242
Euclid: Advanced routing based on transaction_initiator and issuer_country#10658
GSM: Standardized error fields and refined lookup logic#10600
Added CIT support using saved ACH payment methods#10592
2025-12-24:
Weekly Highlights

Advanced Error Insights

Enhanced Shift4 error mapping to propagate specific issuer error codes.

Expanded Payment Capabilities

Introduced PayJustNow In-Store and OpenBanking support.

Decryption Enhancements

Added support for Apple Pay decryption on Braintree and NMI via WASM.

Optimized Data Retrieval

Launched batch retrieval endpoint and refined metadata propagation.

Architectural Consolidation

Refactored gateway routing into a unified execution path.

Connectors

Shift4 & Gigadat
Shift4: Enhanced error mapping for granular issuer codes#10748
Gigadat: Added Interac customer info storage#10749
Braintree
Apple Pay HS-Decryption support and expanded UCS wallet support#10734
PayJustNow
Implemented In-Store payment method#10745
Nuvei & Novalnet
Nuvei: Implemented passthrough payout flow#10463
Novalnet: Made billing email mandatory for SEPA#10720

Core & Platform

Metadata propagation from locker to payment method response#10645
Added support for guest checkout and batch data retrieval#10487
Consolidated gateway routing into single execution path#10710
Added Apple Pay decryption via WASM (NMI)#10740
2025-12-31:
Weekly Highlights

Advanced Error Structuring

Introduced structured error details for granular breakdown of failures.

Redirection & SDK Session

Refactored order creation for seamless redirection flows.

Unified Payment Architecture

Transitioned core logic to Granular Flow and unified gateway context.

Proxy V2 Volatile ID

Added flexible handling for temporary payment method tokens.

Payout Transparency

Propagated payout_id in connector events for better audit trails.

Connectors

Zift & FINIX
Zift: Updated transaction logic to use Ecommerce industry categorization#10775
FINIX: Added support for webhooks and statement descriptors#10758
Trustpay & Payme
Refactored create order interface for redirection and SDK sessions#10779

Core & Platform

Integrated volatile payment method ID for proxy-based workflows#10597
Added update trackers for platform payment models#10691
Migrated preprocessing to Granular Flow architecture#10778
Added structured error details to payment_attempts#10646
